About Duet

Duet is a beautiful Jekyll portfolio theme designed to showcase your work in style. Perfect for designers, artists, photographers and developers to use for their portfolio website.

Hai, 22.

multidisciplinary designer, full-stack designer & art director, specialised in creating layout and designing website, branding system and publication design.

currently based in melbourne, aus. work internationally. open up to take part in new & interesting design projects.

cv available upon request. → contact
